name: İş İngilizcesi Kelimeleri
description: İş hayatında sık kullanılan İngilizce kelimeler

words.meaning: An assembly of people for discussion or business
words.example: We have a meeting with the clients tomorrow.

words.meaning: The latest time or date by which something should be completed
words.example: The deadline for this project is next Friday.

words.meaning: An estimate of income and expenditure for a set period of time
words.example: We need to stay within our budget.

words.meaning: To try to reach an agreement by discussion
words.example: We need to negotiate better terms.

words.meaning: A written or spoken agreement intended to be enforceable by law
words.example: Both parties signed the contract.

words.meaning: A person with whom one works in a profession or business
words.example: My colleagues are very supportive.

words.meaning: A fixed regular payment made by an employer to an employee
words.example: He received a salary increase last month.

words.meaning: The action of raising someone to a higher position or rank
words.example: She got a promotion after three years.

words.meaning: A document containing a summary of a person's education and work experience
words.example: I updated my resume before applying for the job.

words.meaning: A meeting in which someone is asked questions to see if they are suitable for a job
words.example: I have a job interview tomorrow.

words.meaning: A business organization that makes, buys, or sells goods or provides services
words.example: He works for a large technology company.

words.meaning: A person responsible for controlling or administering all or part of a company
words.example: She is the manager of the marketing department.

words.meaning: A person or organization using the services of a professional person or company
words.example: Our clients expect high-quality service.

words.meaning: A financial gain, especially the difference between the amount earned and the amount spent
words.example: The company made a profit last year.

words.meaning: The fact or process of losing something or someone
words.example: The company reported a loss for the first quarter.

words.meaning: The action or process of investing money for profit
words.example: This is a good investment opportunity.

words.meaning: An area or arena in which commercial dealings are conducted
words.example: We need to expand into new markets.

words.meaning: A plan of action designed to achieve a long-term or overall aim
words.example: The company is developing a new marketing strategy.

words.meaning: The object of a person's ambition or effort; an aim or desired result
words.example: Our goal is to increase sales by 20%.

words.meaning: A person, object, or place selected as the aim of an attack
words.example: We exceeded our sales target this month.

words.meaning: A document giving information about a particular subject
words.example: I need to write a report on the project's progress.

words.meaning: A speech or talk in which a new product, idea, or piece of work is shown and explained to an audience
words.example: She gave an excellent presentation to the board.

words.meaning: A formal meeting of people with a shared interest
words.example: We attended a business conference last week.

words.meaning: A group of people who work together
words.example: Our team is working on a new project.

words.meaning: The action of leading a group of people or an organization
words.example: Good leadership is essential for success.

words.meaning: A conclusion or resolution reached after consideration
words.example: We need to make a decision by tomorrow.

words.meaning: The state or fact of having a duty to deal with something
words.example: It's your responsibility to complete the report on time.

words.meaning: The action or process of carrying out or accomplishing an action, task, or function
words.example: Her performance at work has been excellent.

words.meaning: Information about reactions to a product, a person's performance of a task, etc.
words.example: I received positive feedback from my manager.

words.meaning: The latest time or date by which something should be completed
words.example: We need to meet the deadline for this project.
